phrases: Win a stay at Kiriyako Hot Springs Hotel
But I would rather have third prize.
You like hot springs that much, Noel?
It is a big bath that you go in with other people, I guess.
Is it bigger than the bath in your house?
Is it bigger than a lake?
If we win, you can see for yourself.
We have a first prize winner!
I wonder if she will come.
This is a rare sight, seeing you help at home.
Not as rare as someone who would go help at someone else's shop, like you.
What was I supposed to say?
What were you supposed to say?
I have to get ready to move out.
The lady from the hotel came and invited us.
Going to the hot springs would be nice once in a while, huh?
I do not have one for you.
Why would I go with you?
Who would go with their own sister?
Well now that we agree on something, go away.
You are getting in the way of business.
Koharu, can I ask you for a favor?
She told me I should invite you.
I cannot take that from someone I do not really even know.
In fact she is really straightforward and easy to get to know.
What should I do with the rest of these coupons?
Oh, Yuzuki, want to come to the hot springs with us?
I was just thinking about going!
Do you have any coupons left?
I can go to the hot springs.
We are going to the hot springs together on her next break.
Take care of the shop for a bit.
Oh, so Noel could not come?
But you can come, right, Nonoka?
I will ask Koharu what to do about the rest of the coupons.
Maybe there is someone she wants to invite.
I would not mind just the three of us, but...
I see, she has some left.
There is leftover curry in the fridge.
Heat it up if you are going to have it.
Put it on low heat so it does not splatter.
I know how to make it, too, you know.
Still, you have to eat your salad.
You are too fussy about food.
And do not leave the dishes out once you are done eating.
It gets really hard to wash them.
I need to tell her today.
I was worried about leaving Dad by himself.
I am glad we are not really late.
Th-There is something I want to tell you before we go.
I do not think I am early.
Do not be in such a rush.
S-Sorry, I will come later next time.
Do not worry, I took care of it.
They are selling them here, too.
but they were better when I ate them as a kid.
Outdoor Baths (Down the hall and to the right.)
Hot springs, hot springs, hot springs with Shione.
It is a pretty nice view.
I did not think you would say that.
It is not like I approve of the saucer.
We are just in a cease fire.
Why are you getting all comfortable?
You know there is something we have to do first.
We have to go to the bath!
We are a bit too early.
I want to go to the hot springs!
Was not there something you needed to do, Yuzuki?
Did not you have to say something to Nonoka?
I will be back in the room.
I have to talk to you.
So what did you want to talk to me about?
I thought maybe if we are in a different environment,
it would be easier for me to say this.
Sure, I will hear you out.
I cannot get it out of my mind
that I did something so awful to you.
So if you are going to forgive me, hit me really hard!
I said as hard as you can.
It would not be fair if I got serious.
I am not going to be here in this town next year.
She could have invited me, right?
I guess I should clean you.
So it must have been that night.
White Bunny of the Snow Country
Do you like the saucer, Shione?
Why would you ask such a thing?
You are always taking pictures of it.
We are eating, are not we?
I could not see without my glasses.
What if it was not me?
I am happy you invited me today.
Maybe Noel can come next time.
And Togawa-san, if it is possible.
A bath is a bath, is not it?
So what if you are with someone?
I had him help at the store.
You are not going to say you wanted him to come?
Hey, do not you have someone?
When is the last time I was not alone?
You could have shopped at my place.
Can we come over to your place someday?
The hot springs were so big!
Because I was with my friend.
I do not intend to make any more friends.
You like the saucer, do not you?
I could not walk around with this.
But we should finish the leftovers first.
I told you not to let it burn.
I figured she might like it out here more than in my room.
I want to ask you for a favor.
Next episode of Celestial Method : What I Lost.
